text: Ilse Uyttersprot (10 May 1967 â€“ 4 August 2020) was a Belgian politician. She was a member of the Chamber of Representatives from 2007 to 2010. From 2007 to 2013, she was mayor of Aalst, Belgium. Uyttersprot was murdered by her boyfriend with a hammer on 4 August 2020 in Aalst, aged 53. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian mayors Category:Christelijke Volkspartij politicians Category:Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams politicians Category:Deaths by beating Category:Flemish politicians Category:Murder victims Category:People from East Flanders
title: Ilse Uyttersprot
